SA10nagmmk_u:0: MMK_1.1 na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpy ahetutaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:1: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kva cana ke cana //
SA10nagmmk_u:2: MMK_1.2 catvāraḥ pratyayā hetur ārambaṇam anantaram /
SA10nagmmk_u:4: MMK_1.3 na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:6: MMK_1.4 kriyā na pratyayavatī nāpratyayavatī kriyā /
SA10nagmmk_u:7: pratyayā nākriyāvantaḥ kriyāvantaś ca santy uta //
SA10nagmmk_u:8: MMK_1.5 utpadyate pratītyemān itīme pratyayāḥ kila /
SA10nagmmk_u:9: yāvan notpadyata ime tāvan nāpratyayāḥ katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:10: MMK_1.6 naivāsato naiva sataḥ pratyayo 'rthasya yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:11: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataś ca pratyayena kim //
SA10nagmmk_u:12: MMK_1.7 na san nāsan na sad asan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
SA10nagmmk_u:13: kathaṃ nirvartako hetur evaṃ sati hi yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:14: MMK_1.8 anārambaṇa evāyaṃ san dharma upadiśyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:17: nānantaram ato yuktaṃ niruddhe pratyayaś ca kaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:18: MMK_1.10 bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:20: MMK_1.11 na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣvasti tat phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:21: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tac ca bhaven na pratyayeṣu yat //
SA10nagmmk_u:22: MMK_1.12 athāsad api tat tebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ pravartate /
SA10nagmmk_u:26: MMK_1.14 tasmān na pratyayamayaṃ nāpratyayamayaṃ phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:29: MMK_2.1 gataṃ na gamyate tāvad agataṃ naiva gamyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:31: MMK_2.2 ceṣṭā yatra gatis tatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:32: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatis tataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:35: MMK_2.4 gamyamānasya gamanaṃ yasya tasya prasajyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:36: ṛte gater gamyamānaṃ gamyamānaṃ hi gamyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:38: yena tad gamyamānaṃ ca yac cātra gamanaṃ punaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:39: MMK_2.6 dvau gantārau prasajyete prasakte gamanadvaye /
SA10nagmmk_u:41: MMK_2.7 gantāraṃ cet tiraskṛtya gamanaṃ nopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:43: MMK_2.8 gantā na gacchati tāvad agantā naiva gacchati /
SA10nagmmk_u:44: anyo gantur agantuś ca kas tṛtīyo 'tha gacchati //
SA10nagmmk_u:45: MMK_2.9 gantā tāvad gacchatīti katham evopapatsyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:47: MMK_2.10 pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:48: gamanena vinā gantā gantur gamanam icchataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:49: MMK_2.11 gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati /
SA10nagmmk_u:50: ganteti cājyate yena gantā san yac ca gacchati //
SA10nagmmk_u:51: MMK_2.12 gate nārabhyate gantuṃ gantuṃ nārabhyate 'gate /
SA10nagmmk_u:53: MMK_2.13 na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhād gamyamānaṃ na vā gatam /
SA10nagmmk_u:55: MMK_2.14 gataṃ kiṃ gamyamānaṃ kim agataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:57: MMK_2.15 gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvad agantā naiva tiṣṭhati /
SA10nagmmk_u:58: anyo gantur agantuś ca kas tṛtīyo 'tha tiṣṭhati //
SA10nagmmk_u:59: MMK_2.16 gantā tāvat tiṣṭhatīti katham evopapatsyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:61: MMK_2.17 na tiṣṭhati gamyamānān na gatān nāgatād api /
SA10nagmmk_u:62: gamanaṃ saṃpravṛttiś ca nivṛttiś ca gateḥ samā //
SA10nagmmk_u:63: MMK_2.18 yad eva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:64: anya eva punar gantā gater iti na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:65: MMK_2.19 yad eva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhaved yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:66: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:67: MMK_2.20 anya eva punar gantā gater yadi vikalpyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:68: gamanaṃ syād ṛte gantur gantā syād gamanād ṛte //
SA10nagmmk_u:69: MMK_2.21 ekībhāvena vā siddhir nānābhāvena vā yayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:70: na vidyate tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:71: MMK_2.22 gatyā yayājyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10nagmmk_u:72: yasmān na gatipūrvo 'sti kaścid kiṃcid dhi gacchati //
SA10nagmmk_u:73: MMK_2.23 gatyā yayājyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10nagmmk_u:74: gatī dve nopapadyete yasmād eke tu gantari //
SA10nagmmk_u:75: MMK_2.24 sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
SA10nagmmk_u:77: MMK_2.25 gamanaṃ sadasadbhūtaḥ triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
SA10nagmmk_u:78: tasmād gatiś ca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:80: MMK_3.1 darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:82: MMK_3.2 svam ātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tat tam eva na paśyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:83: na paśyati yad ātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tat parān //
SA10nagmmk_u:86: MMK_3.4 nāpaśyamānaṃ bhavati yadā kiṃ cana darśanam /
SA10nagmmk_u:87: darśanaṃ paśyatīty evaṃ katham etat tu yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:88: MMK_3.5 paśyati darśanaṃ naiva naiva paśyaty adarśanam /
SA10nagmmk_u:90: MMK_3.6 draṣṭā nāsty atiraskṛtya tiraskṛtya ca darśanam /
SA10nagmmk_u:91: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭary asati te kutaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:96: MMK_3.9 vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:102: āhetukaṃ na cāsty arthaḥ kaścid āhetukaḥ kva cit //
SA10nagmmk_u:103: MMK_4.3 rūpeṇa tu vinirmuktaṃ yadi syād rūpakāraṇam /
SA10nagmmk_u:104: akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ syād nāsty akāryaṃ ca kāraṇam //
SA10nagmmk_u:105: MMK_4.4 rūpe saty eva rūpasya kāraṇaṃ nopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:107: MMK_4.5 niṣkāraṇaṃ punā rūpaṃ naiva naivopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:108: tasmād rūpagatān kāṃścin na vikalpān vikalpayet //
SA10nagmmk_u:109: MMK_4.6 na kāraṇasya sadṛśaṃ kāryam ity upapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:112: sarveṣām eva bhāvānāṃ rūpeṇaiva samaḥ kramaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:113: MMK_4.8 vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10nagmmk_u:115: MMK_4.9 vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10nagmmk_u:118: MMK_5.1 nākāśaṃ vidyate kiṃcit pūrvam ākāśalakṣaṇāt /
SA10nagmmk_u:119: alakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeta syāt pūrvaṃ yadi lakṣaṇāt //
SA10nagmmk_u:120: MMK_5.2 alakṣaṇo na kaścic ca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kva cit /
SA10nagmmk_u:121: asaty alakṣaṇe bhāve kramatāṃ kuha lakṣaṇam //
SA10nagmmk_u:122: MMK_5.3 nālakṣaṇe lakṣaṇasya pravṛttir na salakṣaṇe /
SA10nagmmk_u:124: MMK_5.4 lakṣaṇāsaṃpravṛttau ca na lakṣyam upapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:126: MMK_5.5 tasmān na vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:128: MMK_5.6 avidyamāne bhāve ca kasyābhāvo bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:130: MMK_5.7 tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam /
SA10nagmmk_u:132: MMK_5.8 astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:133: bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam //
SA10nagmmk_u:135: MMK_6.1 rāgād yadi bhavet pūrvaṃ rakto rāgatiraskṛtaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:136: taṃ pratītya bhaved rāgo rakte rāgo bhavet sati //
SA10nagmmk_u:137: MMK_6.2 rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:138: sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'py eṣa samaḥ kramaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:139: MMK_6.3 sahaiva punar udbhūtir na yuktā rāgaraktayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:141: MMK_6.4 naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tat saha /
SA10nagmmk_u:143: MMK_6.5 ekatve sahabhāvaś cet syāt sahāyaṃ vināpi saḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:144: pṛthaktve sahabhāvaś cet syāt sahāyaṃ vināpi saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:145: MMK_6.6 pṛthaktve sahabhāvaś ca yadi kiṃ rāgaraktayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:147: MMK_6.7 siddhaḥ pṛthakpṛthagbhāvo yadi vā rāgaraktayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:149: MMK_6.8 pṛthag na sidhyatīty evaṃ sahabhāvaṃ vikāṅkṣasi /
SA10nagmmk_u:151: MMK_6.9 pṛthagbhāvāprasiddheś ca sahabhāvo na sidhyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:153: MMK_6.10 evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhir na saha nāsaha /
SA10nagmmk_u:154: rāgavat sarvadharmāṇāṃ siddhir na saha nāsaha //
SA10nagmmk_u:156: MMK_7.1 yadi saṃskṛta utpādas tatra yuktā trilakṣaṇī /
SA10nagmmk_u:158: MMK_7.2 utpādādyās trayo vyastā nālaṃ lakṣaṇakarmaṇi /
SA10nagmmk_u:159: saṃskṛtasya samastāḥ syur ekatra katham ekadā //
SA10nagmmk_u:161: asti ced anavasthaivaṃ nāsti cet te na saṃskṛtāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:164: MMK_7.5 utpādotpāda utpādo mūlotpādasya te yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:165: maulenājanitas taṃ te sa kathaṃ janayiṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:166: MMK_7.6 sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:167: maulaḥ sa tenājanitas tam utpādayate katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:168: MMK_7.7 ayam utpādyamānas te kāmam utpādayed imam /
SA10nagmmk_u:172: MMK_7.9 pradīpe nāndhakāro 'sti yatra cāsau pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:173: kiṃ prakāśayate dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:174: MMK_7.10 katham utpadyamānena pradīpena tamo hatam /
SA10nagmmk_u:175: notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā //
SA10nagmmk_u:176: MMK_7.11 aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:180: MMK_7.13 anutpanno 'yam utpādaḥ svātmānaṃ janayet katham /
SA10nagmmk_u:181: athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:182: MMK_7.14 notpadyamānaṃ notpannaṃ nānutpannaṃ kathaṃ cana /
SA10nagmmk_u:184: MMK_7.15 utpadyamānam utpattāv idaṃ na kramate yadā /
SA10nagmmk_u:186: MMK_7.16 pratītya yad yad bhavati tat tac chāntaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:187: tasmād utpadyamānaṃ ca śāntam utpattir eva ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:188: MMK_7.17 yadi kaścid anutpanno bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kva cit /
SA10nagmmk_u:189: utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati //
SA10nagmmk_u:190: MMK_7.18 utpadyamānam utpādo yadi cotpādayaty ayam /
SA10nagmmk_u:191: utpādayet tam utpādam utpādaḥ katamaḥ punaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:192: MMK_7.19 anya utpādayaty enaṃ yady utpādo 'navasthitiḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:194: MMK_7.20 sataś ca tāvad utpattir asataś ca na yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:195: na sataś cāsataś ceti pūrvam evopapāditam //
SA10nagmmk_u:197: yaś cānirudhyamānas tu sa bhāvo nopapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:198: MMK_7.22 nāsthitas tiṣṭhate bhāvaḥ sthito bhāvo na tiṣṭhati /
SA10nagmmk_u:199: na tiṣṭhate tiṣṭhamānaḥ ko 'nutpannaś ca tiṣṭhati //
SA10nagmmk_u:201: yaś cānirudhyamānas tu sa bhāvo nopapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:203: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
SA10nagmmk_u:204: MMK_7.25 sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:206: MMK_7.26 nirudhyate nāniruddhaṃ na niruddhaṃ nirudhyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:207: tathā nirudhyamānaṃ ca kim ajātaṃ nirudhyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:208: MMK_7.27 sthitasya tāvad bhāvasya nirodho nopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:210: MMK_7.28 tayaivāvasthayāvasthā na hi saiva nirudhyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:214: MMK_7.30 sataś ca tāvad bhāvasya nirodho nopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:215: ekatve na hi bhāvaś ca nābhāvaś copapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:216: MMK_7.31 asato 'pi na bhāvasya nirodha upapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:217: na dvitīyasya śirasaś chedanaṃ vidyate yathā //
SA10nagmmk_u:218: MMK_7.32 na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā /
SA10nagmmk_u:222: MMK_7.34 yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
SA10nagmmk_u:223: tathotpādas tathā sthānaṃ tathā bhaṅga udāhṛtam //
SA10nagmmk_u:225: MMK_8.1 sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam /
SA10nagmmk_u:227: MMK_8.2 sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syād akartṛkam /
SA10nagmmk_u:228: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syād akarmakaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:229: MMK_8.3 karoti yady asadbhūto 'sadbhūtaṃ karma kārakaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:230: ahetukaṃ bhavet karma kartā cāhetuko bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:231: MMK_8.4 hetāv asati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:232: tadabhāve kriyā kartā kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:233: MMK_8.5 dharmādharmau na vidyete kriyādīnām asaṃbhave /
SA10nagmmk_u:234: dharme cāsaty adharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:235: MMK_8.6 phale 'sati na mokṣāya na svargāyopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:237: MMK_8.7 kārakaḥ sadasadbhūtaḥ sadasat kurute na tat /
SA10nagmmk_u:238: parasparaviruddhaṃ hi sac cāsac caikataḥ kutaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:239: MMK_8.8 satā ca kriyate nāsan nāsatā kriyate ca sat /
SA10nagmmk_u:240: kartrā sarve prasajyante doṣās tatra ta eva hi //
SA10nagmmk_u:241: MMK_8.9 nāsadbhūtaṃ na sadbhūtaḥ sadasadbhūtam eva vā /
SA10nagmmk_u:242: karoti kārakaḥ karma pūrvoktair eva hetubhiḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:243: MMK_8.10 nāsadbhūto 'pi sadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhūtam eva vā /
SA10nagmmk_u:244: karoti kārakaḥ karma pūrvoktair eva hetubhiḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:245: MMK_8.11 karoti sadasadbhūto na san nāsac ca kārakaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:246: karma tat tu vijānīyāt pūrvoktair eva hetubhiḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:247: MMK_8.12 pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
SA10nagmmk_u:249: MMK_8.13 evaṃ vidyād upādānaṃ vyutsargād iti karmaṇaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:250: kartuś ca karmakartṛbhyāṃ śeṣān bhāvān vibhāvayet //
SA10nagmmk_u:253: bhavanti yasya prāg ebhyaḥ so 'stīty eke vadantyuta //
SA10nagmmk_u:254: MMK_9.2 kathaṃ hy avidyamānasya darśanādi bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:255: bhāvasya tasmāt prāg ebhyaḥ so 'sti bhāvo vyavasthitaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:257: yaḥ prāg vyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:258: MMK_9.4 vināpi darśanādīni yadi cāsau vyavasthitaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:259: amūny api bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:260: MMK_9.5 ajyate kenacit kaścit kiṃcit kena cid ajyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:261: kutaḥ kiṃcid vinā kaścit kiṃcit kiṃcid vinā kutaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:262: MMK_9.6 sarvebhyo darśanādibhyaḥ kaścit pūrvo na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:264: MMK_9.7 sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:265: ekaikasmāt kathaṃ pūrvo darśanādeḥ sa vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:266: MMK_9.8 draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:267: ekaikasmād bhavet pūrvam evaṃ caitan na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:268: MMK_9.9 draṣṭānya eva śrotānyo vedako 'nyaḥ punar yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:269: sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:271: bhavanti yebhyas teṣv eṣa bhūteṣv api na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:273: na vidyate ced yasya sa na vidyanta imāny api //
SA10nagmmk_u:274: MMK_9.12 prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvam eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:275: na vidyate 'sti nāstīti nivṛttās tatra kalpanāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:277: MMK_10.1 yad indhanaṃ sa ced agnir ekatvaṃ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:278: anyaś ced indhanād agnir indhanād apy ṛte bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:283: MMK_10.4 tatraitat syād idhyamānam indhanaṃ bhavatīti cet /
SA10nagmmk_u:284: kenedhyatām indhanaṃ tat tāvanmātram idaṃ yadā //
SA10nagmmk_u:285: MMK_10.5 anyo na prāpsyate 'prapto na dhakṣyaty adahan punaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:286: na nirvāsyaty anirvāṇaḥ sthāsyate vā svaliṅgavān //
SA10nagmmk_u:287: MMK_10.6 anya evandhanād agnir indhanaṃ prāpnuyād yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:288: strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaś ca striyaṃ yathā //
SA10nagmmk_u:289: MMK_10.7 anya evendhanād agnir indhanaṃ kāmam āpnuyāt /
SA10nagmmk_u:293: MMK_10.9 yadīndhanam apekṣyāgnir agneḥ siddhasya sādhanam /
SA10nagmmk_u:295: MMK_10.10 yo 'pekṣya sidhyate bhāvas tam evāpekṣya sidhyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:296: yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kam apekṣya kaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:297: MMK_10.11 yo 'pekṣya sidhyate bhāvaḥ so 'siddho 'pekṣate katham /
SA10nagmmk_u:298: athāpy apekṣate siddhas tv apekṣāsya na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:299: MMK_10.12 apekṣyendhanam agnir na nānapekṣyāgnir indhanam /
SA10nagmmk_u:301: MMK_10.13 āgacchaty anyato nāgnir indhane 'gnir na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:303: MMK_10.14 indhanaṃ punar agnir na nāgnir anyatra cendhanāt /
SA10nagmmk_u:304: nāgnir indhanavān nāgnāv indhanāni na teṣu saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:307: MMK_10.16 ātmanaś ca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak /
SA10nagmmk_u:310: MMK_11.1 pūrvā prajñāyate koṭir nety uvāca mahāmuniḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:312: MMK_11.2 naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:314: MMK_11.3 pūrvaṃ jātir yadi bhavej jarāmaraṇam uttaram /
SA10nagmmk_u:315: nirjarā maraṇā jātir bhavej jāyeta cāmṛtaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:316: MMK_11.4 paścāj jātir yadi bhavej jarāmaraṇam āditaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:318: MMK_11.5 na jarāmaraṇaṃ caiva jātiś ca saha yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:320: MMK_11.6 yatra na prabhavanty ete pūrvāparasahakramāḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:321: prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ taj jarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim //
SA10nagmmk_u:322: MMK_11.7 kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇam eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:323: vedanā vedakaś caiva santy arthā ye ca ke cana //
SA10nagmmk_u:324: MMK_11.8 pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:325: sarveṣām api bhāvānāṃ pūrvā koṭī na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:327: MMK_12.1 svayaṃ kṛtaṃ parakṛtaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṛtam ahetukam /
SA10nagmmk_u:328: duḥkham ity eka icchanti tac ca kāryaṃ na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:329: MMK_12.2 svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavet pratītya na tato bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:330: skandhān imān amī skandhāḥ saṃbhavanti pratītya hi //
SA10nagmmk_u:331: MMK_12.3 yady amībhya ime 'nye syur ebhyo vāmī pare yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:332: bhavet parakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ parair ebhir amī kṛtāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:333: MMK_12.4 svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ punar vinā /
SA10nagmmk_u:334: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam //
SA10nagmmk_u:335: MMK_12.5 parapudgalajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi yasmai pradīyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:336: pareṇa kṛtvā tad duḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:337: MMK_12.6 parapudgalajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi kaḥ parapudgalaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:338: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat //
SA10nagmmk_u:339: MMK_12.7 svayaṃ kṛtasyāprasiddher duḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ kutaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:340: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yat kuryāt tat tasya syāt svayaṃ kṛtam //
SA10nagmmk_u:341: MMK_12.8 na tāvat svakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tat kṛtam /
SA10nagmmk_u:342: paro nātmakṛtaś cet syād duḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:343: MMK_12.9 syād ubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ syād ekaikakṛtaṃ yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:345: MMK_12.10 na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:346: bāhyānām api bhāvānāṃ cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:348: MMK_13.1 tan mṛṣā moṣadharma yad bhagavān ity abhāṣata /
SA10nagmmk_u:349: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārās tena te mṛṣā //
SA10nagmmk_u:350: MMK_13.2 tan mṛṣā moṣadharma yad yadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:353: nāsvabhāvaś ca bhāvo 'sti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:354: MMK_13.4 kasya syād anyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvaś cen na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:355: kasya syād anyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvo yadi vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:356: MMK_13.5 tasyaiva nānyathābhāvo nāpy anyasyaiva yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:357: yuvā na jīryate yasmād yasmāj jīrṇo na jīryate //
SA10nagmmk_u:358: MMK_13.6 tasya ced anyathābhāvaḥ kṣīram eva bhaved dadhi /
SA10nagmmk_u:360: MMK_13.7 yady aśūnyaṃ bhavet kiṃcit syāc chūnyam iti kiṃ cana /
SA10nagmmk_u:361: na kiṃcid asty aśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:362: MMK_13.8 śūnyatā sarvadṛṣṭīnāṃ proktā niḥsaraṇaṃ jinaiḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:363: yeṣāṃ tu śūnyatādṛṣṭis tān asādhyān babhāṣire //
SA10nagmmk_u:364: MMK_14.1 draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇy etāni dviśo dviśaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:365: sarvaśaś ca na saṃsargam anyonyena vrajanty uta //
SA10nagmmk_u:366: MMK_14.2 evaṃ rāgaś ca raktaś ca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām /
SA10nagmmk_u:367: traidhena śeṣāḥ kleśāś ca śeṣāṇy āyatanāni ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:368: MMK_14.3 anyenānyasya saṃsargas tac cānyatvaṃ na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:369: draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ yan na saṃsargaṃ vrajanty ataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:370: MMK_14.4 na ca kevalam anyatvaṃ draṣṭavyāder na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:372: MMK_14.5 anyad anyat pratītyānyan nānyad anyad ṛte 'nyataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:373: yat pratītya ca yat tasmāt tad anyan nopapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:374: MMK_14.6 yady anyad anyad anyasmād anyasmād apy ṛte bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:375: tad anyad anyad anyasmād ṛte nāsti ca nāsty ataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:376: MMK_14.7 nānyasmin vidyate 'nyatvam ananyasmin na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:377: avidyamāne cānyatve nāsty anyad vā tad eva vā //
SA10nagmmk_u:378: MMK_14.8 na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:379: saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:381: MMK_15.1 na saṃbhavaḥ svabhāvasya yuktaḥ pratyayahetubhiḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:383: MMK_15.2 svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
SA10nagmmk_u:384: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:387: MMK_15.4 svabhāvaparabhāvābhyām ṛte bhāvaḥ kutaḥ punaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:388: svabhāve parabhāve ca sati bhāvo hi sidhyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:389: MMK_15.5 bhāvasya ced aprasiddhir abhāvo naiva sidhyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:390: bhāvasya hy anyathābhāvam abhāvaṃ bruvate janāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:391: MMK_15.6 svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvam eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:392: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane //
SA10nagmmk_u:395: MMK_15.8 yady astitvaṃ prakṛtyā syān na bhaved asya nāstitā /
SA10nagmmk_u:397: MMK_15.9 prakṛtau kasya vāsatyām anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:398: prakṛtau kasya vā satyām anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:401: MMK_15.11 asti yad dhi svabhāvena na tan nāstīti śāśvatam /
SA10nagmmk_u:402: nāstīdānīm abhūt pūrvam ity ucchedaḥ prasajyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:404: MMK_16.1 saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cen na nityāḥ saṃsaranti te /
SA10nagmmk_u:405: saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'py eṣa samaḥ kramaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:408: MMK_16.3 upādānād upādānaṃ saṃsaran vibhavo bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:409: vibhavaś cānupādānaḥ kaḥ sa kiṃ saṃsariṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:410: MMK_16.4 saṃskārāṇāṃ na nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ cid upapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:411: sattvasyāpi na nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ cid upapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:412: MMK_16.5 na badhyante na mucyanta udayavyayadharmiṇaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:413: saṃskārāḥ pūrvavat sattvo badhyate na na mucyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:414: MMK_16.6 bandhanaṃ ced upādānaṃ sopādāno na badhyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:416: MMK_16.7 badhnīyād bandhanaṃ kāmaṃ bandhyāt pūrvaṃ bhaved yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:417: na cāsti tac cheṣam uktaṃ gamyamānagatāgataiḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:418: MMK_16.8 baddho na mucyate tāvad abaddho naiva mucyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:420: MMK_16.9 nirvāsyāmy anupādāno nirvāṇaṃ me bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:423: yatra kas tatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:424: MMK_17.1 ātmasaṃyamakaṃ cetaḥ parānugrāhakaṃ ca yat /
SA10nagmmk_u:425: maitraṃ sa dharamas tad bījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:426: MMK_17.2 cetanā cetayitvā ca karmoktaṃ paramarṣiṇā /
SA10nagmmk_u:428: MMK_17.3 tatra yac cetanety uktaṃ karma tan mānasaṃ smṛtam /
SA10nagmmk_u:429: cetayitvā ca yat tūktaṃ tat tu kāyikavācikam //
SA10nagmmk_u:432: MMK_17.5 paribhogānvayaṃ puṇyam apuṇyaṃ ca tathāvidham /
SA10nagmmk_u:433: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:434: MMK_17.6 tiṣṭhaty ā pākakālāc cet karma tan nityatām iyāt /
SA10nagmmk_u:435: niruddhaṃ cen niruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:437: tataḥ phalam ṛte bījāt sa ca nābhipravartate //
SA10nagmmk_u:438: MMK_17.8 bījāc ca yasmāt saṃtānaḥ saṃtānāc ca phalodbhavaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:439: bījapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmān nocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam //
SA10nagmmk_u:441: tataḥ phalam ṛte cittāt sa ca nābhipravartate //
SA10nagmmk_u:442: MMK_17.10 cittāc ca yasmāt saṃtānaḥ saṃtānāc ca phalodbhavaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:443: karmapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmān nocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam //
SA10nagmmk_u:444: MMK_17.11 dharmasya sādhanopāyāḥ śuklāḥ karmapathā daśa /
SA10nagmmk_u:445: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:446: MMK_17.12 bahavaś ca mahāntaś ca doṣāḥ syur yadi kalpanā /
SA10nagmmk_u:448: MMK_17.13 imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:450: MMK_17.14 pattraṃ yathā 'vipraṇāśastatharṇam iva karma ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:451: caturvidho dhātutaḥ sa prakṛtyāvyākṛtaś ca saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:452: MMK_17.15 prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā /
SA10nagmmk_u:454: MMK_17.16 prahāṇataḥ praheyaḥ syāt karmaṇaḥ saṃkrameṇa vā /
SA10nagmmk_u:456: MMK_17.17 sarveṣāṃ visabhāgānāṃ sabhāgānāṃ ca karmaṇām /
SA10nagmmk_u:457: pratisaṃdhau sadhātūnām eka utpadyate tu saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:458: MMK_17.18 karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:460: MMK_17.19 phalavyatikramād vā sa maraṇād vā nirudhyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:461: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet //
SA10nagmmk_u:462: MMK_17.20 śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraś ca na śāśvatam /
SA10nagmmk_u:464: MMK_17.21 karma notpadyate kasmān niḥsvabhāvaṃ yatas tataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:465: yasmāc ca tad anutpannaṃ na tasmād vipraṇaśyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:466: MMK_17.22 karma svabhāvataś cet syāc chāśvataṃ syād asaṃśayam /
SA10nagmmk_u:467: akṛtaṃ ca bhavet karma kriyate na hi śāśvatam //
SA10nagmmk_u:470: MMK_17.24 vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:472: MMK_17.25 tad vipakvavipākaṃ ca punar eva vipakṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:473: karma vyavasthitaṃ yasmāt tasmāt svābhāvikaṃ yadi //
SA10nagmmk_u:474: MMK_17.26 karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:475: na cet te tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāt tattvataḥ katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:476: MMK_17.27 karma kleśāś ca dehānāṃ pratyayāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:477: karma kleśāś ca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā //
SA10nagmmk_u:478: MMK_17.28 avidyānivṛto jantus tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanaś ca saḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:479: sa bhoktā sa ca na kartur anyo na ca sa eva saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:481: asti yasmād idaṃ karma tasmāt kartāpi nāsty ataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:482: MMK_17.30 karma cen nāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syāt karmajaṃ phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:483: asaty atha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:484: MMK_17.31 yathā nirmitakaṃ śāstā nirmimīta rddhisaṃpadā /
SA10nagmmk_u:485: nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:486: MMK_17.32 tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā yat karma tat kṛtam /
SA10nagmmk_u:488: MMK_17.33 kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāś ca kartāraś ca phalāni ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:491: MMK_18.1 ātmā skandhā yadi bhaved udayavyayabhāg bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:493: MMK_18.2 ātmany asati cātmīyaṃ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:495: MMK_18.3 nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaś ca so 'pi na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:496: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:497: MMK_18.4 mamety aham iti kṣīṇe bahirdhādhyātmam eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:500: te prapañcāt prapañcas tu śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:501: MMK_18.6 ātmety api prajñapitam anātmety api deśitam /
SA10nagmmk_u:502: buddhair nātmā na cānātmā kaścid ity api deśitam //
SA10nagmmk_u:505: MMK_18.8 sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyam eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:509: MMK_18.10 pratītya yad yad bhavati na hi tāvat tad eva tat /
SA10nagmmk_u:513: MMK_18.12 saṃbuddhānām anutpāde śrāvakāṇāṃ punaḥ kṣaye /
SA10nagmmk_u:516: MMK_19.1 pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca yady atītam apekṣya hi /
SA10nagmmk_u:518: MMK_19.2 pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca na stas tatra punar yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:519: pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca syātāṃ katham apekṣya tam //
SA10nagmmk_u:520: MMK_19.3 anapekṣya punaḥ siddhir nātītaṃ vidyate tayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:521: pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca tasmāt kālo na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:524: MMK_19.5 nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:525: yo gṛhyetāgṛhītaś ca kālaḥ prajñapyate katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:526: MMK_19.6 bhāvaṃ pratītya kālaś cet kālo bhāvād ṛte kutaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:527: na ca kaś cana bhāvo 'sti kutaḥ kālo bhaviṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:529: MMK_20.1 hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:530: phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:531: MMK_20.2 hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:532: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:533: MMK_20.3 hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryām asti cet phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:534: gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:535: MMK_20.4 hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cet phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:536: hetavaḥ pratyayāś ca syur ahetupratyayaiḥ samāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:537: MMK_20.5 hetuṃ phalasya dattvā ca yadi hetur nirudhyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:538: yad dattaṃ yan nirudhaṃ ca hetor ātmadvayaṃ bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:539: MMK_20.6 hetuṃ phalasyādattvā ca yadi hetur nirudhyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:540: hetau niruddhe jātaṃ tat phalam āhetukaṃ bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:541: MMK_20.7 phalaṃ sahaiva sāmagryā yadi prādurbhavet punaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:542: ekakālau prasajyete janako yaś ca janyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:543: MMK_20.8 pūrvam eva ca sāmagryāḥ phalaṃ prādurbhaved yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:545: MMK_20.9 niruddhe cet phalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:547: MMK_20.10 janayet phalam utpannaṃ niruddho 'staṃgataḥ katham /
SA10nagmmk_u:548: hetus tiṣṭhann api kathaṃ phalena janayed vṛtaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:549: MMK_20.11 athāvṛtaḥ phalenāsau katamaj janayet phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:550: na hy adṛṣṭvā na dṛṣṭvāpi hetur janayate phalam //
SA10nagmmk_u:551: MMK_20.12 nātītasya hy atītena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10nagmmk_u:552: nājātena na jātena saṃgatir jātu vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:553: MMK_20.13 na jātasya hy ajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10nagmmk_u:554: nātītena na jātena saṃgatir jātu vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:555: MMK_20.14 nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10nagmmk_u:556: nājātena na naṣṭena saṃgatir jātu vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:557: MMK_20.15 asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:558: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam //
SA10nagmmk_u:559: MMK_20.16 hetuḥ phalena śūnyaś cet kathaṃ janayate phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:560: hetuḥ phalenāśūnyaś cet kathaṃ janayate phalam //
SA10nagmmk_u:561: MMK_20.17 phalaṃ notpatsyate 'śūnyam aśūnyaṃ na nirotsyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:563: MMK_20.18 katham utpatsyate śūnyaṃ kathaṃ śūnyaṃ nirotsyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:564: śūnyam apy aniruddhaṃ tad anutpannaṃ prasajyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:565: MMK_20.19 hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:566: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:567: MMK_20.20 ekatve phalahetvoḥ syād aikyaṃ janakajanyayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:568: pṛthaktve phalahetvoḥ syāt tulyo hetur ahetunā //
SA10nagmmk_u:569: MMK_20.21 phalaṃ svabhāvasadbhūtaṃ kiṃ hetur janayiṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:573: MMK_20.23 na ca pratyayahetūnām iyam ātmānam ātmanā /
SA10nagmmk_u:574: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayet phalam //
SA10nagmmk_u:575: MMK_20.24 na sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ nāsāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:576: asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā //
SA10nagmmk_u:578: MMK_21.1 vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai /
SA10nagmmk_u:579: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai //
SA10nagmmk_u:580: MMK_21.2 bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā /
SA10nagmmk_u:581: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā //
SA10nagmmk_u:582: MMK_21.3 saṃbhavenaiva vibhavaḥ kathaṃ saha bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:583: na janma maraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:584: MMK_21.4 bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā /
SA10nagmmk_u:585: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācin na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:586: MMK_21.5 saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva kathaṃ saha bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:587: na janma maraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:588: MMK_21.6 sahānyonyena vā siddhir vinānyonyena vā yayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:589: na vidyate tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:590: MMK_21.7 kṣayasya saṃbhavo nāsti nākṣayasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:591: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:592: MMK_21.8 saṃbhavo vibhavaś caiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:593: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:594: MMK_21.9 saṃbhavo vibhavaś caiva na śūnyasyopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:596: MMK_21.10 saṃbhavo vibhavaś caiva naika ity upapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:597: saṃbhavo vibhavaś caiva na nānety upapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:598: MMK_21.11 dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva vibhavaś caiva te bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:599: dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva mohād vibhava eva ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:600: MMK_21.12 na bhāvāj jāyate bhāvo bhāvo 'bhāvān na jāyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:602: MMK_21.13 na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:603: na svataḥ parataś caiva jāyate jāyate kutaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:605: prasajyate sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:606: MMK_21.15 bhāvam abhyupapannasya naivocchedo na śāśvatam /
SA10nagmmk_u:608: MMK_21.16 udayavyayasaṃtānaḥ phalahetvor bhavaḥ sa cet /
SA10nagmmk_u:610: MMK_21.17 sadbhāvasya svabhāvena nāsadbhāvaś ca yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:612: MMK_21.18 carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:613: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:614: MMK_21.19 nirudhyamāne carame prathamo yadi jāyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:616: MMK_21.20 na cen nirudhyamānaś ca jāyamānaś ca yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:617: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:618: MMK_21.21 evaṃ triṣv api kāleṣu na yuktā bhavasaṃtatiḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:619: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:621: MMK_22.1 skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:623: MMK_22.2 buddhaḥ skandhān upādāya yadi nāsti svabhāvataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:624: svabhāvataś ca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:625: MMK_22.3 pratītya parabhāvaṃ yaḥ so 'nātmety upapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:626: yaś cānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:627: MMK_22.4 yadi nāsti svabhāvaś ca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:629: MMK_22.5 skandhān yady anupādāya bhavet kaścit tathāgataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:630: sa idānīm upādadyād upādāya tato bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:631: MMK_22.6 skandhāṃś cāpy anupādāya nāsti kaścit tathāgataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:632: yaś ca nāsty anupādāya sa upādāsyate katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:633: MMK_22.7 na bhavaty anupādattam upādānaṃ ca kiṃ cana /
SA10nagmmk_u:634: na cāsti nirupādānaḥ kathaṃ cana tathāgataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:635: MMK_22.8 tattvānyatvena yo nāsti mṛgyamāṇaś ca pañcadhā /
SA10nagmmk_u:637: MMK_22.9 yad apīdam upādānaṃ tat svabhāvān na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:638: svabhāvataś ca yan nāsti kutas tat parabhāvataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:639: MMK_22.10 evaṃ śūnyam upādānam upādātā ca sarvaśaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:640: prajñapyate ca śūnyena kathaṃ śūnyas tathāgataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:641: MMK_22.11 śūnyam iti na vaktavyam aśūnyam iti vā bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:642: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:643: MMK_22.12 śāśvatāśāśvatādy atra kutaḥ śānte catuṣṭayam /
SA10nagmmk_u:644: antānantādi cāpy atra kutaḥ śānte catuṣṭayam //
SA10nagmmk_u:645: MMK_22.13 ghanagrāho gṛhītas tu yenāstīti tathāgataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:647: MMK_22.14 svabhāvataś ca śūnye 'smiṃś cintā naivopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:648: paraṃ nirodhād bhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā //
SA10nagmmk_u:649: MMK_22.15 prapañcayanti ye buddhaṃ prapañcātītam avyayam /
SA10nagmmk_u:650: te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam //
SA10nagmmk_u:651: MMK_22.16 tathāgato yatsvabhāvas tatsvabhāvam idaṃ jagat /
SA10nagmmk_u:654: MMK_23.1 saṃkalpaprabhavo rāgo dveṣo mohaś ca kathyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:657: te svabhāvān na vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:658: MMK_23.3 ātmano 'stitvanāstitve na kathaṃ cic ca sidhyataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:660: MMK_23.4 kasya cid dhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:661: kaścid āho vinā kaṃcit santi kleśā na kasyacit //
SA10nagmmk_u:662: MMK_23.5 svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā /
SA10nagmmk_u:663: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣv api na pañcadhā //
SA10nagmmk_u:666: MMK_23.7 rūpaśabdarasasparśā gandhā dharmāś ca ṣaḍvidham /
SA10nagmmk_u:667: vastu rāgasya doṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:668: MMK_23.8 rūpaśabdarasasparśā gandhā dharmāś ca kevalāḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:670: MMK_23.9 aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutas teṣu bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:672: MMK_23.10 anapekṣya śubhaṃ nāsty aśubhaṃ prajñapayemahi /
SA10nagmmk_u:673: yat pratītya śubhaṃ tasmāc chubhaṃ naivopapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:675: yat pratītyāśubhaṃ tasmād aśubhaṃ naiva vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:676: MMK_23.12 avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:678: MMK_23.13 anitye nityam ity evaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:679: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:680: MMK_23.14 anitye nityam ity evaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:681: anityam ity api grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:682: MMK_23.15 yena gṛhṇāti yo grāho grahītā yac ca gṛhyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:683: upaśāntāni sarvāṇi tasmād grāho na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:684: MMK_23.16 avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyag eva vā /
SA10nagmmk_u:686: MMK_23.17 na cāpi viparītasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:690: MMK_23.19 anutpannāḥ kathaṃ nāma bhaviṣyanti viparyayāḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:692: MMK_23.20 na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:693: na svataḥ parataś ceti viparyayagataḥ kutaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:694: MMK_23.21 ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:695: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:696: MMK_23.22 nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:697: anātmā 'śucy anityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:700: MMK_23.24 yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ kecid dhi kasyacit /
SA10nagmmk_u:701: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:702: MMK_23.25 yady abhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ kecid dhi kasyacit /
SA10nagmmk_u:704: MMK_24.1 yadi śūnyam idaṃ sarvam udayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:706: MMK_24.2 parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:708: MMK_24.3 tadabhāvān na vidyante catvāry āryaphalāni ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:709: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:710: MMK_24.4 saṃgho nāsti na cet santi te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:712: MMK_24.5 dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:713: evaṃ trīṇy api ratnāni bruvāṇaḥ pratibādhase //
SA10nagmmk_u:714: MMK_24.6 śūnyatāṃ phalasadbhāvam adharmaṃ dharmam eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:716: MMK_24.7 atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam /
SA10nagmmk_u:717: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase //
SA10nagmmk_u:718: MMK_24.8 dve satye samupāśritya buddhānāṃ dharmadeśanā /
SA10nagmmk_u:720: MMK_24.9 ye 'nayor na vijānanti vibhāgaṃ satyayor dvayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:721: te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane //
SA10nagmmk_u:722: MMK_24.10 vyavahāram anāśritya paramārtho na deśyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:725: sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā //
SA10nagmmk_u:726: MMK_24.12 ataś ca pratyudāvṛttaṃ cittaṃ deśayituṃ muneḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:728: MMK_24.13 śūnyatāyām adhilayaṃ yaṃ punaḥ kurute bhavān /
SA10nagmmk_u:730: MMK_24.14 sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:731: sarvaṃ na yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:732: MMK_24.15 sa tvaṃ doṣān ātmanīyān asmāsu paripātayan /
SA10nagmmk_u:733: aśvam evābhirūḍhaḥ sann aśvam evāsi vismṛtaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:734: MMK_24.16 svabhāvād yadi bhāvānāṃ sadbhāvam anupaśyasi /
SA10nagmmk_u:735: ahetupratyayān bhāvāṃs tvam evaṃ sati paśyasi //
SA10nagmmk_u:736: MMK_24.17 kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām /
SA10nagmmk_u:737: utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase //
SA10nagmmk_u:738: MMK_24.18 yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ pracakṣmahe /
SA10nagmmk_u:739: sā prajñaptir upādāya pratipat saiva madhyamā //
SA10nagmmk_u:740: MMK_24.19 apratītya samutpanno dharmaḥ kaścin na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:741: yasmāt tasmād aśūnyo hi dharmaḥ kaścin na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:742: MMK_24.20 yady aśūnyam idaṃ sarvam udayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:744: MMK_24.21 apratītya samutpannaṃ kuto duḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:745: anityam uktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tat svābhāvye na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:746: MMK_24.22 svabhāvato vidyamānaṃ kiṃ punaḥ samudeṣyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:748: MMK_24.23 na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:750: MMK_24.24 svābhāvye sati mārgasya bhāvanā nopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:751: athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:752: MMK_24.25 yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaś ca na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:754: MMK_24.26 svabhāvenāparijñānaṃ yadi tasya punaḥ katham /
SA10nagmmk_u:756: MMK_24.27 prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇe bhāvanā caivam eva te /
SA10nagmmk_u:757: parijñāvan na yujyante catvāry api phalāni ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:758: MMK_24.28 svabhāvenānadhigataṃ yat phalaṃ tat punaḥ katham /
SA10nagmmk_u:760: MMK_24.29 phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:761: saṃgho nāsti na cet santi te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:762: MMK_24.30 abhāvāc cāryasatyānāṃ saddharmo 'pi na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:763: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:764: MMK_24.31 apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:765: apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:766: MMK_24.32 yaś cābuddhaḥ svabhāvena sa bodhāya ghaṭann api /
SA10nagmmk_u:768: MMK_24.33 na ca dharmam adharmaṃ vā kaścij jātu kariṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:769: kim aṣūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi //
SA10nagmmk_u:770: MMK_24.34 vinā dharmam adharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:771: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:772: MMK_24.35 dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:776: MMK_24.37 na kartavyaṃ bhavet kiṃcid anārabdhā bhavet kriyā /
SA10nagmmk_u:778: MMK_24.38 ajātam aniruddhaṃ ca kūṭaśthaṃ ca bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:780: MMK_24.39 asaṃprāptasya ca prāptir duḥkhaparyantakarma ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:781: sarvakleśaprahāṇaṃ ca yady aśūnyaṃ na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:782: MMK_24.40 yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyatīdaṃ sa paśyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:783: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgam eva ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:785: MMK_25.1 yadi śūnyam idaṃ sarvam udayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:786: prahāṇād vā nirodhād vā kasya nirvāṇam iṣyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:787: MMK_25.2 yady aśūnyam idaṃ sarvam udayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:788: prahāṇād vā nirodhād vā kasya nirvāṇam iṣyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:791: MMK_25.4 bhāvas tāvan na nirvāṇaṃ jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇam /
SA10nagmmk_u:792: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
SA10nagmmk_u:793: MMK_25.5 bhāvaś ca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:794: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kva cana kaś cana //
SA10nagmmk_u:795: MMK_25.6 bhāvaś ca yadi nirvāṇam anupādāya tat katham /
SA10nagmmk_u:796: nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:797: MMK_25.7 bhāvo yadi na nirvāṇam abhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:798: nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvas tatra vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:799: MMK_25.8 yady abhāvaś ca nirvāṇam anupādāya tat katham /
SA10nagmmk_u:800: nirvāṇaṃ na hy abhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:801: MMK_25.9 ya ājavaṃjavībhāva upādāya pratītya vā /
SA10nagmmk_u:803: MMK_25.10 prahāṇaṃ cābravīc chāstā bhavasya vibhavasya ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:804: tasmān na bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇam iti yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:805: MMK_25.11 bhaved abhāvo bhāvaś ca nirvāṇam ubhayaṃ yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:806: bhaved abhāvo bhāvaś ca mokṣas tac ca na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:807: MMK_25.12 bhaved abhāvo bhāvaś ca nirvāṇam ubhayaṃ yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:809: MMK_25.13 bhaved abhāvo bhāvaś ca nirvāṇam ubhayaṃ katham /
SA10nagmmk_u:810: asaṃskṛtaṃ hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau //
SA10nagmmk_u:811: MMK_25.14 bhaved abhāvo bhāvaś ca nirvāṇa ubhayaṃ katham /
SA10nagmmk_u:812: tayor abhāvo hy ekatra prakāśatamasor iva //
SA10nagmmk_u:813: MMK_25.15 naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇam iti yā 'ñjanā /
SA10nagmmk_u:814: abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:815: MMK_25.16 naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:816: naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tad ajyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:817: MMK_25.17 paraṃ nirodhād bhagavān bhavatīty eva nājyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:818: na bhavaty ubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nājyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:819: MMK_25.18 tiṣṭhamāno 'pi bhagavān bhavatīty eva nājyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:820: na bhavaty ubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nājyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:821: MMK_25.19 na saṃsārasya nirvāṇāt kiṃcid asti viśeṣaṇam /
SA10nagmmk_u:822: na nirvāṇasya saṃsārāt kiṃcid asti viśeṣaṇam //
SA10nagmmk_u:823: MMK_25.20 nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:824: na tayor antaraṃ kiṃcit susūkṣmam api vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:825: MMK_25.21 paraṃ nirodhād antādyāḥ śāśvatādyāś ca dṛṣṭayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:826: nirvāṇam aparāntaṃ ca pūrvāntaṃ ca samāśritāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:827: MMK_25.22 śūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu kim anantaṃ kim antavat /
SA10nagmmk_u:828: kim anantam antavac ca nānantaṃ nāntavac ca kim //
SA10nagmmk_u:829: MMK_25.23 kiṃ tad eva kim anyat kiṃ śāśvataṃ kim aśāśvatam /
SA10nagmmk_u:830: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayam apy atha //
SA10nagmmk_u:832: na kva cit kasyacit kaścid dharmo buddhena deśitaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:835: abhisaṃskurute yāṃs tair gatiṃ gacchati karmabhiḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:840: MMK_26.4 cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhāram eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:843: sparśaḥ sa tasmāt sparśāc ca vedanā saṃpravartate //
SA10nagmmk_u:844: MMK_26.6 vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā vedanārthaṃ hi tṛṣyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:846: MMK_26.7 upādāne sati bhava upādātuḥ pravartate /
SA10nagmmk_u:847: syād dhi yady anupādāno mucyeta na bhaved bhavaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:848: MMK_26.8 pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavo bhavāj jātiḥ pravartate /
SA10nagmmk_u:850: MMK_26.9 daurmanasyam upāyāsā jāter etat pravartate /
SA10nagmmk_u:852: MMK_26.10 saṃsāramūlaṃ saṃskārān avidvān saṃskaroty ataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:853: avidvān kārakas tasmān na vidvāṃs tattvadarśanāt //
SA10nagmmk_u:856: MMK_26.12 tasya tasya nirodhena tat tan nābhipravartate /
SA10nagmmk_u:859: MMK_27.1 abhūm atītam adhvānaṃ nābhūvam iti dṛṣṭayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:861: MMK_27.2 dṛṣṭayo na bhaviṣyāmi kim anyo 'nāgate 'dhvani /
SA10nagmmk_u:863: MMK_27.3 abhūm atītam adhvānam ity etan nopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:864: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavaty ayam //
SA10nagmmk_u:865: MMK_27.4 sa evātmeti tu bhaved upādānaṃ viśiṣyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:867: MMK_27.5 upādānavinirmukto nāsty ātmeti kṛte sati /
SA10nagmmk_u:868: syād upādānam evātmā nāsti cātmeti vaḥ punaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:869: MMK_27.6 na copādānam evātmā vyeti tat samudeti ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:871: MMK_27.7 anyaḥ punar upādānād ātmā naivopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:872: gṛhyeta hy anupādāno yady anyo na ca gṛhyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:873: MMK_27.8 evaṃ nānya upādānān na copādānam eva saḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:874: ātmā nāsty anupādāno nāpi nāsty eṣa niścayaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:875: MMK_27.9 nābhūm atītam adhvānam ity etan nopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:876: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavaty ayam //
SA10nagmmk_u:877: MMK_27.10 yadi hy ayaṃ bhaved anyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:878: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhet tatra jāyeta cāmṛtaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:879: MMK_27.11 ucchedaḥ karmaṇāṃ nāśaḥ kṛtam anyena karma ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:881: MMK_27.12 nāpy abhūtvā samudbhūto doṣo hy atra prasajyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:882: kṛtako vā bhaved ātmā saṃbhūto vāpy ahetukaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:883: MMK_27.13 evaṃ dṛṣtir atīte yā nābhūm aham abhūm aham /
SA10nagmmk_u:885: MMK_27.14 adhvany anāgate kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmīti darśanam /
SA10nagmmk_u:886: na bhaviṣyāmi cety etad atītenādhvanā samam //
SA10nagmmk_u:887: MMK_27.15 sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaś ced evaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
SA10nagmmk_u:888: anutpannaś ca devaḥ syāj jāyate na hi śāśvatam //
SA10nagmmk_u:889: MMK_27.16 devād anyo manuṣyaś ced aśāśvatam ato bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:890: devād anyo manuṣyaś cet saṃtatir nopapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:891: MMK_27.17 divyo yady ekadeśaḥ syād ekdeśaś ca mānuṣaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:892: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavet tac ca na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:893: MMK_27.18 aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca prasiddham ubhayaṃ yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:894: siddhe na śāśvataṃ kāmaṃ naivāśāśvatam ity api //
SA10nagmmk_u:895: MMK_27.19 kutaścid āgataḥ kaścit kiṃcid gacchet punaḥ kva cit /
SA10nagmmk_u:896: yadi tasmād anādis tu saṃsāraḥ syān na cāsti saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:897: MMK_27.20 nāsti cec chāśvataḥ kaścit ko bhaviṣyaty aśāśvataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:899: MMK_27.21 antavān yadi lokaḥ syāt paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:900: athāpy anantavāl lokaḥ paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:901: MMK_27.22 skandhānām eṣa saṃtāno yasmād dīpārciṣām iva /
SA10nagmmk_u:902: tasmān nānantavattvaṃ ca nāntavattvaṃ ca yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:903: MMK_27.23 pūrve yadi ca bhajyerann utpadyeran na cāpy amī /
SA10nagmmk_u:904: skandhāḥ skandhān pratītyemān atha loko 'ntavān bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:905: MMK_27.24 pūrve yadi na bhajyerann utpadyeran na cāpyamī /
SA10nagmmk_u:906: skandhāḥ skandhān pratītyemāl loko 'nanto bhaved atha //
SA10nagmmk_u:907: MMK_27.25 antavān ekadeśaś ced ekadeśas tv anantavān /
SA10nagmmk_u:908: syād antavān anantaś ca lokas tac ca na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:909: MMK_27.26 kathaṃ tāvad upādātur ekadeśo vinaṅkṣyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:910: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitan na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:911: MMK_27.27 upādānaikadeśaś ca kathaṃ nāma vinaṅkṣyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:912: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśo naitad apy upapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:913: MMK_27.28 antavac cāpy anantaṃ ca prasiddham ubhayaṃ yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:914: siddhe naivāntavat kāmaṃ naivānantavad ity api //
SA10nagmmk_u:915: MMK_27.29 atha vā sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāc chāśvatādayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:916: kva kasya katamāḥ kasmāt saṃbhaviṣyanti dṛṣṭayaḥ //
